entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Ear Falls
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:54 PM CDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Ear Falls 6:00 PM CDT Tuesday 21 March 2023
Temperature: -3.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 33 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -17.8°C
Wind: E 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Snow beginning after midnight. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h late this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 30%
